dcterms:creator: Nitish Srivastava
Elman Mansimov
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: Moving MNIST is a widespread benchmark for depicting 2 digits’ movement with constant velocity. It contains 64 × 64 × 1 consecutive frames with 10 for input and 10 for prediction, 10,000 randomly generated sequences for training and 10,000 fixed parts for testing.
dcterms:title: Moving MNIST

dcterms:creator: Yuhei Yamamoto
Kazuhito Ichii
Atsushi Higuchi
dcterms:description: Typhoon dataset is a meteorology radar data released by CEReS. The images are resized into 64 × 64 × 1 resolution and normalized to [0, 1]. The dataset contains 1,809 sequences for training and 603 sequences for testing, using 8-hour observation data to predict the next 4 hours.
dcterms:title: Typhoon
